definition[0]: a set of instructions for a computer, stored and used as a unit
example[0]: You can run a macro to change to US spelling.
definition[1]: large and concerning a whole system rather than particular parts of it
definition[2]: a series of commands written to perform a particular task. Macros can be saved and used again
example[3]: Write a macro so that when a button is hit, all the fields appear on the spreadsheet.
definition[3]: very large and concerned with a whole system rather than just part of it
example[4]: A number of chapters are devoted to fiscal policy in a macro-context.
